text: Iburāhīmu ga jibun no chichi no tame ni, o yurushi o motomete inotta no wa, tada kare (chichi) to yakusoku ga atta tamedearu. Sore de kare (chichi) ga arrā no tekidearu koto ga meihaku ni natta toki, kare (chichi) to no kankei o kotowatta. Hontōni iburāhīmu wa, nyūwade shinbōdzuyoi jinbutsudeatta
